clinical_study.brief_title: Validation of the French Version of the CQR (Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology)
clinical_study.official_title: Validation of the French Version of the CQR (Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology): Specific Tool for Evaluation of Observance of Rheumatology Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to develop a French language version of the Compliance-Questionnaire-Rheumatology for use in French and Francophone rheumatology services

primary_outcome.measure: Test-retest agreement of French translation of the Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: Intraclass correlation and Kappa coefficient of 2 evaluations taken 3 hours apart

primary_outcome.measure: Structural validity of French translation of the Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Validation of the Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology against gold standard (erythrocyte methotrexate polyglutamates (MTX PGs) concentration)
Rate of missing responses to each question of French translation of Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology
Rate of questionnaires with at least 1 missing item
Validation of the short form of the French Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology
Compare French Compliance Questionnaire Rheumatology results against general questionnaire Morisky Medication Adherence Scale (MMAS-8)
secondary_outcome.description: Sensitivity and specificity compared against MTX PGs level

secondary_outcome.measure: Sex of observant versus non-observant patients
Age of observant versus non-observant patients
education level of observant versus non-observant patients
profession of observant versus non-observant patients
marital status of observant versus non-observant patients

secondary_outcome.description: Blood MTX PG concentration nmol/L by LC-MS/MS

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life in observant versus non-observant patients
secondary_outcome.description: Medical Outcomes Study 36-Item Short-Form Health Survey (SF-36)

secondary_outcome.measure: Health-related quality of life in observant versus non-observant patients
Functional incapacity in observant versus non-observant patients
Pain experience in observant versus non-observant patients
Cognitive representations of medication in observant versus non-observant patients

intervention.description: Patients are asked to complete several questionnaires

study_pop.textblock: Patients with rheumatoid polyarthritis as defined by the ACR-EULAR 2010 criteria, treated orally or subcutaneously with MTX for at least 3 months being followed in the rheumatology department of Montpellier, Toulouse, Bordeaux or Nîmes hospitals.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The patient must have given their free and informed consent and signed the consent form
- The patient must be a member or beneficiary of a health insurance plan
- The patient is at least 18 years old
- The patient has rheumatoid polyarthritis as defined by the ACR-EULAR 2010 criteria, treated orally or subcutaneously with MTX for at least 3 months. Other treatments at the same time are authorized
Exclusion Criteria:
- The subject is participating in an interventional study, or is in a period of exclusion determined by a previous study
- The subject refuses to sign the consent
- It is impossible to give the subject informed information
- The patient is under safeguard of justice or state guardianship
- The subject has a contraindication to taking methotrexate (including a patient with a desire to become pregnant).
